verses.name: Deuteronomy 9:20
verses.text: And the Lord was very angry with Aaron to have destroyed him: and I prayed for Aaron also the same time.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 9:21
verses.text: And I took your sin, the calf which ye had made, and burnt it with fire, and stamped it, and ground it very small, even until it was as small as dust: and I cast the dust thereof into the brook that descended out of the mount.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 9:22
verses.text: And at Taberah, and at Massah, and at Kibroth–hattaavah, ye provoked the Lord to wrath.
